BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL
   010159Z FEB BY M/V NPS RAMFORM CHALLENGER
   TOWING 12 4500 METER LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   23-12.00S 041-12.65W, 23-05.72S 041-23.13W,
   23-18.13S 041-43.42W, 23-27.75S 041-30.90W,
   23-15.53S 041-12.72W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 010259Z FEB.
